code: import React from'react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Logout=()=>{const{logout}=useAuth();const handleLogout=async()=>{try{await logout();window.location.href='/';}catch(error){console.error('Error during logout:',error);alert('Logout failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"});};export default Logout;
